text: I just came to get something I forgot.

...isn't that kind of thing,
usually left to the professionals?
Things like the stage concept and direction.

It's not like we're forcing you to,
but if you have any good ideas...

I'm asking why we're being
asked to think about it.

Of course like you said,
it'd be smoother if the stage was left to the pros.

Just, this time, the approach is to incorporate everyone's opinions
as much as possible because we think it will resonate with the fans.

...I see.
Thank you for your response.
